text: Roberto Blanda (born 14 December 1970) is an Italian rower. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Roberto Blanda
